application_type_full: Prior Approval: Change of use - offices to dwellinghouses
description: Change of use of existing office building (Class B1) to form fifty four residential units (Class C3)
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby approved shall be completed within three years of the date of this granting of prior approval.

Condition : 2 - 2.	No demolition or construction work shall take place on the site except between the hours of 8:00am to 6:00pm on Mondays to Friday and 9:00am to 1:00pm on Saturdays and none shall take place on Sundays and Public Holidays without the prior agreement of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 3 - 3.	Prior to the first occupation of the flats hereby permitted, a Car Park Management Plan (CMPM) shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority.
The CMPM shall include the following:
"	Measures to prevent parking in inappropriate locations.
"	Notwithstanding the information shown within drawing number A17/SA306 /07 received: 11/08/2017, a plan showing the layout of car park, including details of Electric Vehicle charging points for the bays at a proportion no less than 20% Active and 20% passive, at least 10% of spaces demarked for disabled persons, and removal of the parking bay closest to the car park ramp.
The CMPM shall then be implemented in accordance with the approved details before first occupation of the development hereby approved and thereafter retained for use at all times without obstruction.

Condition : 4 - 4.	Prior to the first occupation of the flats hereby permitted, full details of cycle parking provision (including enclosure details) shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The approved details shall conform to current guidance such as the TfL London Cycling Design Standards in design and layout, and be fully implemented and made available for use before the first occupation of the development hereby approved and thereafter retained for use at all times without obstruction.

Condition : 5 - 5.	Prior to the first occupation of the flats hereby permitted, the local planning authority shall be informed of the agreed naming and numbering of the proposed dwellings so that arrangements can be put in place to ensure that, with the exception of Blue Badge holders, no resident of the development shall obtain a resident's parking permit.
